1 Yogic Therapy Sri Bagavath 2 Introduction As a small boy, I was not aware of anything called ‘disease’. I do not remember ever being bed-ridden due to sickness. I used to stay in a hostel when I was pursuing my P.U.C education. One of my friends was infected with jaundice. While accompanying him to the hospital and attending to his needs in the hostel room, I also contracted jaundice. Even after becoming alright, I used to frequently fall sick. Stomach ulcers developed after one year. Hence, I had to make frequent visits to the hospital. It was only then that I started correcting my eating habits. I began to bring my health under control. In later days, I was introduced to Healer Bhaskar. He was the person who made me understand that “Out body will automatically take care of / rectify itself”. Later, I was introduced to Acu Healer A. Umar Farook, who strengthened my understanding of this concept. What started as a superficial concept, gradually deepened into a profound understanding.
